code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/Header.css';import Menu from'./Menu';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[activeButton,setActiveButton]=useState("");const[menuOpen,setMenuOpen]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleExit=()=>{window.location.href="https://www.google.com";};const toggleMenu=()=>{setMenuOpen(!menuOpen);};const buttons=[{name:"Exit",icon:"exit.svg",activeIcon:"exit-active.svg",action:handleExit},{name:"Chat",icon:"message.svg",activeIcon:"message-active.svg",action:()=>navigate("/chat")},{name:"Menu",icon:"menu.svg",activeIcon:"menu-active.svg",action:toggleMenu}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/logo.svg",alt:"Prefem Logo",className:"logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-buttons",children:buttons.map(_ref=>{let{name,icon,activeIcon,action}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:`nav-btn ${activeButton===name?"active":""}`,onClick:()=>{setActiveButton(name);action();},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`/images/${activeButton===name?activeIcon:icon}`,alt:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-text",children:name})]},name);})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu,{isOpen:menuOpen,onClose:()=>setMenuOpen(false)})]});};export default Header;
